Package org.turbogwt.net.http.client.serialization

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Deserializer<T>
    Performs deserialization of Types.
    Serdes<T>
    Performs serialization and deserialization of a type to/from plain text.
    Serializer<T>
    Performs serialization of types.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeserializationContext
    Context of deserialization.
    FormParamSerializer
    Serializer for FORM requests.
    JsonBooleanSerdes
    De/Serializer of JSON booleans.
    JsonNumberSerdes
    De/Serializer of JSON numbers.
    JsonObjectSerdes<T>
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON objects.
    JsonRecordReader
    This class provides useful methods for retrieving data from a JSON.
    JsonRecordWriter
    This class provides useful methods for building a JSON.
    JsonSerdes<T>
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON.
    JsonStringSerdes
    De/Serializer of JSON strings.
    JsonValueSerdes<T>
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON simple values.
    OverlaySerdes<T extends JavaScriptObject>
    Serializer/Deserializer of Overlay types.
    SerializationContext
    Context of serialization.
    TextDeserializer
    Pass-through deserializer for plain text and generic stuff.
    VoidSerdes
    De/Serializer for Void type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SerializationException
    SerializationException is the superclass exception related to Serialization issues.
    UnableToDeserializeException  
    UnableToSerializeException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    JsonDeserialize
    Defines that the type must have an auto-generated json deserializer registered by default in any Requestor instance.
    JsonSerialize
    Defines that the type must have an auto-generated json serializer registered by default in any Requestor instance.
